page.title: 10INDUSTRY - CEMENT MAKING
page.content: BLUE CIRCLE INDUSTRIES Just outside Bradwell is the Hope Cement Works. It is the largest cement manufacturing plant in the North of England. {Limestone}is blasted out of the quarry above Bradwell in huge lumps then crushed into small pieces. {Shale is quarried close by between Hope and Bradwell. These are the two main ingredients in the cement making process. The cement works is by far the most important supplier of employment in this area. Almost half the children in Bradwell Primary School have parents working at this one factory. In the last few years the work force has been falling as new machines have been introduced. This is a rather worrying situation for school leavers who will soon be looking for jobs.
